title.rendered: Financial Commission Participated in 2019 Global Forex Awards

content.rendered:
October 7th,  2019, The Financial Commission today announces its successful participation in the Global Forex Awards 2019 which took place in Limassol, Cyprus on October 3rd, 2019. The Commission congratulates all award winners, including approved broker members AxiTrader, Roboforex and 4xCube!

The Winners!

This year’s awards brought together a who’s who of internationally recognized Forex brands that have excelled at providing the best in terms of retail and institutional trading, customer service, trading tools and education.

Among the winners are approved broker members AxiTrader, which received the award for Best Asian Forex Trading Platform; 4xCube, which won two awards for Global & European Forex Newcomer of the Year; and RoboForex, who’s brands were awarded Best Global Forex Affiliate Programme and Leading European Indices Broker.

The five awards presented to our approved broker members echo our continued commitment to provide the very best services and support for retail trading customers around the world and upholding the highest standards of commercial honor.

Global Forex Awards 2019

The event provided an opportunity for Financial Commission representatives to speak with recognized international brokerages regarding recent regulatory and market developments that are impacting the retail Forex market in Europe and elsewhere. Several market leading firms have expressed an interest in Financial Commission’s free dispute resolution services for traders.

About Financial Commission

Founded in 2013, the Financial Commission is a leading independent member-driven external dispute resolution (EDR) organization for international online brokerages, exchanges and Blockchain firms that participate in global foreign exchange (forex), derivatives, CFD and digital asset markets.

Financial Commission provides efficient compliance solutions to its members, alongside its External Dispute Resolution (EDR) mechanism that serves as an effective channel for processing complaints from clients of member firms.

For more information please contact us at info@financialcommission.com.co.
